station.name: Nostalgie FM
station.longDesc: Nostalgie diffuse les tubes de legende en langue francaise et anglaise. La programmation est basee sur les chansons des annees 60, 70 et 80 et inclut egalement des nouveautes. En rendant hommage aux plus grands chanteurs a travers sa programmation musicale, Nostalgie Ђ La Legende ї est devenue la station de radio dont on ne peut plus se passer. Nostalgie laisse la parole a la musique. Pour le plaisir des auditeurs avant tout, Nostalgie a choisi de laisser la parole a la musique, en proposant une programmation sans emissions animees.

station.name: Voice of Charity Live
station.longDesc: Voice Of Charity (VOC) Christian radio was founded in 1984 by the Maronite Lebanese Missionaries who have run it ever since its inception. It is the leading Christian radio in the Middle East. It offers a broad variety of spiritual, biblical, liturgical, humanitarian, ecumenical, social, and cultural programs prepared and presented by bishops, priests, as well as religious and lay people from all Christian denominations from Lebanon and abroad.

station.name: Jaras Scoop FM
